entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
